Rubik's Cube Playground

  • Solve cube automatically with a basic solving algorithm (~150 moves).

  • Scramble cube with 50 random moves.

  • Undo the previous move (includes moves from scramble or solve, but ignores manual piece changes).

  • l

  • shift + u

  • shift + d

  • shift + l

  • b

  • shift + f
